# LittleCMS Repository

Official repository: https://github.com/littlewebco/little-cms

## Forking

To use LittleCMS for your own project:

1. Fork the repository: https://github.com/littlewebco/little-cms
2. Clone your fork: `git clone https://github.com/YOUR-USERNAME/little-cms.git`
3. Follow the setup guide in README.md

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome! Please open issues and pull requests in the main repository.

## Documentation

- Main README: [README.md](../README.md)
- Setup Guide: [docs/EASY_SETUP.md](../docs/EASY_SETUP.md)
- GitHub Secrets: [docs/GITHUB_SECRETS.md](../docs/GITHUB_SECRETS.md)
